name: AMERICAN FIRST FEDERAL, INC. v. Sheldon M. GORDON et al.
name_abbreviation: Am. First Fed., Inc. v. Gordon

parties:
AMERICAN FIRST FEDERAL, INC.
v.
Sheldon M. GORDON et al.
attorneys: The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 573, 164 A.3d 776 (2017), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
AMERICAN FIRST FEDERAL, INC.
v.
Sheldon M. GORDON et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided October 4, 2017
Aaron A. Romney and Patrick R. Linsey, in support of the petition.
David T. Martin, William, N. Wright and Jonathan P. Vuotto, pro hac vice, in opposition.
The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 573, 164 A.3d 776 (2017), is denied.
ROGERS, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
